name: Mito Europe
tag_list: online, communication, design, branding, development, mito
description: Fresh concepts visuals and clever things
overview:
Mito Europe Ltd was founded by Balazs Kovacs and Balazs Pocze in 2007. Mito’s profile is two-sided: the company both develops own products, like community portal Mutasd.be, and manages branding, design, communication and development projects for its clients.

The founders Balazs Kovacs has 11 years experience in interface design and online branding. Ha was a founding partner of Carnation Online Communications - one of the biggest companies in the Hungarian online communication business. Ha was also Creative Director of the CRM and online communication company Carussel. Balazs Pocze has 8 years experience in national television, 5 in advertising and communication, both online and offline. He had been working as an Editor at TV2, Copywriter at ACG.Hey, Senior Editor at Sanoma Budapest, and as a creative consultant of various projects.
